column2: Alpha Black to Papa Bear. Objective One cleared. Over.
Alpha One to Papa Bear. We've taken the second objective. Over.
Papa Bear, this is Alpha Black. We have rocked the cradle at Haelen. Over.
Roger that, Alpha. Papa Bear out.
Understood. Good work Alpha. Recon confirms, Hottingen Farm is clear. Papa Bear out.
We copy you, Alpha. Objective Three is done. Papa Bear out.
Welcome back, Alpha Team. Your mission is complete. Good work. HQ out.
